faqs.question: What documentation should I verify before purchasing any plot for sale in Saha
faqs.answer: Before finalizing the purchase of any plot in Saha Ambala it is absolutely critical to verify several key documents to ensure the legality and safety of your investment. You must check the mother deed and title chain to confirm clear ownership history and look for the latest registered sale deed. Additionally ensure the plot has a valid non-encumbrance certificate obtained from the sub-registrar's office confirming no ongoing legal disputes or mortgages. Finally verify the approved layout plan and the land use certificate from the competent local authority confirming the plot is designated for residential or commercial use as intended.
